Body:
contig_names = list()
for contig in SeqIO.parse('tests/rmlst.fasta', 'fasta'):
    contig_names.append(contig.id)
multi_positions = 0
for contig_name in contig_names:
    multi_position_dict, to_write = read_contig(contig_name=contig_name,
        bamfile_name='tests/contamination.bam', reference_fasta=
        'tests/rmlst.fasta', quality_cutoff=20, base_cutoff=2)
    multi_positions += sum([len(snp_positions) for snp_positions in
        multi_position_dict.values()])
assert multi_positions == 24
